description.ko: 소리의 물리적 발현으로, 단일 베이스 주파수의 운동 에너지를 고도로 정밀하게 포착했습니다.
description.en: The physical manifestation of sound, capturing the kinetic energy of a single bass frequency in high detail.

prompt: A cinematic visualization of ECHO-0, featuring a frozen pulse of #FFD700 golden liquid metal waves colliding in a dark minimalist void. The soundwaves manifest as 3D parametric oscillations with #4169E1 royal blue frequency ribbons. Microscopic particles of #32CD32 lime light dance to an invisible beat, creating a fluid architecture of sound. High-speed photography style, motion blur, macro lens, 8k resolution, hyper-detailed textures of vibrating liquid mercury.
